parameters.name: PlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup plan.

parameters.name: RequireNoRunningJobs
parameters.description: Specifies whether no running jobs are required.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   **ECS_FILE**: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) files
*   **OSS**: Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets
*   **NAS**: Apsara File Storage NAS file systems
*   **UDM_ECS**: ECS instances
*   **OTS**: Tablestore instances

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault. This parameter is required if the SourceType parameter is not set to UDM_ECS.
